item.title: 亚马逊遭黑客攻击后一年内暂停推出微软办公软件
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已将微软公司基于云计算的 Office 套件的部署推迟了一年，因为两家公司正在努力解决亚马逊对捆绑电子邮件和生产力软件安全性的担忧。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has delayed the deployment of Microsoft Corp.’s cloud-based Office suite for a year as the two companies work to resolve Amazon concerns about the security of the bundle of email and productivity software.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟将有线电视资产与流媒体业务分开
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is changing its corporate structure and creating separate divisions for its cable and streaming businesses.】

item.title: 纽约考虑让财产保险公司承担出租车索赔损失
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，纽约正在考虑要求财产和意外事故保险公司为破产的出租车保险公司美国运输保险公司（American Transit Insurance Co.【原文：New York is considering asking property and casualty insurers to cover the claims of insolvent taxi insurer American Transit Insurance Co., according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 金融集团 Oddo 计划进军不断膨胀的稳定币市场
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Oddo BHF SCA 正在开发一种以欧元计价的稳定币，这一举措将使其进入一个日益拥挤的市场。【原文：Oddo BHF SCA is working on a euro-denominated stablecoin, people familiar with the matter said, an initiative that would bring it into an increasingly crowded market.】

item.title: 戴维-道奇称加拿大经济增长放缓，需要关税应对措施
item.description: 加拿大贝内特琼斯律师事务所（Bennett Jones LLP）表示，加拿大需要维护与美国的关系，但如果特朗普政府对进口商品征收广泛的关税，加拿大将不得不以 "明智、有针对性的方式 "进行报复。【原文：Canada needs to safeguard its relationship with the US but will have to retaliate in a “smart, targeted manner” if the Trump administration puts broad tariffs on imports, said Bennett Jones LLP, the Canadian law firm that’s now home to former central banker David Dodge.】

item.title: 民调显示丹麦央行将下调利率以追随欧洲央行
item.description: 经济学家表示，丹麦央行可能会在周四晚些时候将关键利率下调四分之一个点，以保护其与欧元挂钩的货币。【原文：Denmark’s central bank will probably deliver a quarter-point key rate cut later on Thursday to protect its currency peg to the euro, economists said.】

item.title: 美国上周申请失业救济人数升至两个月来最高点
item.description: 上周，美国失业救济金申请人数升至两个月来的新高，而此时正值年末假期前后，数据波动较大。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose to a two-month high last week, at a time around the end-of-year holidays when data is volatile.】

item.title: 鸡蛋带动美国生产者价格上涨，但美联储公布的数据偏软
item.description: 由于鸡蛋价格飙升，11 月份美国批发通胀意外加速，而其他类别的通胀则表明美联储首选的物价指标增幅不大。【原文：US wholesale inflation unexpectedly accelerated in November on a surge in egg prices, while other categories suggested a muted increase in the Federal Reserve’s preferred price gauge.】

item.title: 贝莱德称最高 2% 的比特币配置是 "合理范围
item.description: 这家全球最大的资产管理公司表示，比特币在多元资产投资组合中确实占有一席之地— 但要达到一定程度。【原文：The world’s biggest asset manager says that Bitcoin does have a place in multi-asset portfolios — up to a certain point.】

item.title: 欧洲央行连续第三次减息以支撑疲弱的经济
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在连续第三次会议上下调了利率，预示着随着通胀率接近 2%，经济陷入困境，明年将有更多的降息举措。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered interest rates for a third consecutive meeting, signaling more reductions next year as inflation nears 2% and the economy struggles.】

item.title: 沃尔玛金融科技公司估值飙升至 25 亿美元，预示着银行的未来
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）为其刚刚起步的金融企业注入了更多的火力，为这家初创企业获得了 25 亿美元的估值，并表明了其深入涉足金融服务领域的雄心。【原文：Walmart Inc. is pouring more firepower into its fledgling financial venture, scoring a $2.5 billion valuation for the startup and signaling its ambition to wade deeper into financial services.】

item.title: 大科技公司正在押注人工智能。你应该赌吗？
item.description:
Alphabet、Amazon.com 和其他公司正在花费数百亿美元。怀疑论者担心会出现泡沫。【原文：

Alphabet, Amazon.com and others are spending tens of billions. Skeptics worry about a bubble.

】

item.title: 特朗普 "极具破坏性 "的能源关税未见赢家
item.description: 当当选总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布他计划对来自加拿大和墨西哥的商品征收关税，直到它们停止移民和毒品的流动时，他说他要这两个国家 "付出非常大的代价！"【原文：When President-elect Donald Trump announced his plan to impose tariffs on goods coming from Canada and Mexico until they stop the flow of migrants and drugs, he said he wanted the countries to “pay a very big price!”】

item.title: 埃克森和雪佛龙为华尔街提供了截然相反的愿景
item.description:
标准石油公司后裔之间的争斗即将沸腾，他们将争夺圭亚那大片土地的控制权。【原文：

The rivalry between Standard Oil descendants is set to boil over as they battle for control of Guyana’s massive patch.

】

item.title: 医生说，卢拉在接受避免脑出血的手术后保持清醒
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）在接受紧急脑部手术两天后，据他的医生说，他在预定的医疗程序后 "清醒并能说话"。【原文：Brazil’s President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was “awake and talking” following a scheduled medical procedure two days after having emergency brain surgery, according to his doctor.】

item.title: 资深银行家离职后瑞银在债务互换中的作用缩小
item.description: 本月早些时候，巴巴多斯完成了一项新颖的债务转换，但有一方却明显缺席：瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）。【原文：When Barbados wrapped up a novel debt swap earlier this month, one party was notably absent: UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 腾讯最新热门游戏历经十年社区建设
item.description: 本周，我一直在玩一款腾讯的新游戏到深夜，而世界上大多数人都不知道这是一款腾讯游戏。但首先...【原文：This week, I’ve been playing late into the night a new Tencent game that most of the world doesn’t know is a Tencent game. But first...】

item.title: 乌克兰因通胀加速而意外上调利率
item.description: 乌克兰政策制定者在四次会议上首次出人意料地提高了借贷成本，试图抑制比预测更快的通货膨胀。【原文：Ukrainian policymakers unexpectedly raised borrowing costs for the first time in four meetings in an attempt to tame inflation that’s accelerated faster than forecast.】

item.title: 新的人工智能、芯片中心催生东南亚繁荣城镇
item.description: 随着北京与华盛顿之间紧张局势的升级，推动科技跨国公司在中国以外地区开展多元化业务，数千亿美元正涌入东南亚城镇，重塑当地经济。【原文：As escalating tensions between Beijing and Washington push tech multinationals to diversify beyond China, hundreds of billions of dollars are pouring into towns in Southeast Asia and reshaping the local economies there.】

item.title: 谷歌和约翰-杜尔押注利用碎石捕集二氧化碳的初创公司
item.description:
科技界的重量级人物正在对一种未经证实的技术下注，以直接从空气中清除气候污染。【原文：

The tech heavyweights are placing a major bet on an unproven technique to pull climate pollution directly from the air. 

】

item.description: 当做空者击倒股票时，往往会引发一场争论：是否有不止一只熊参与其中？【原文：When short sellers knock down stocks, a debate often breaks out: Was there more than one bear involved?】

item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. raised $5.7 billion for its latest flagship credit fund, as it seeks to catch up with rivals in the fast-growing business.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会（WGC）称，黄金的迅猛涨势可能在 2025 年放缓
item.description: 世界黄金协会称，黄金价格在今年创下历史新高后，将在2025年缓慢上涨。【原文：Gold prices are set to rise more slowly in 2025 after a record-breaking run this year, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 瑞士央行施莱格尔称没人喜欢负利率，但负利率确实有效
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士国家银行不喜欢负利率，但在必要时会再次使用负利率来阻止法郎投机。【原文：The Swiss National Bank doesn’t like negative interest rates but will use them again if needed to stem speculation in the franc, President Martin Schlegel said.】

item.title: 贝恩不顾政府禁令，在南非卷土重来
item.description: 贝恩公司（Bain & Co.）因腐败丑闻被禁止与南非政府开展业务长达十年之久，该公司正试图通过免费为一个私人项目工作来修复其在南非受到的名誉创伤。【原文：Bain & Co. is trying to repair its scarred reputation in South Africa by working for free on a private project after it was banned from doing business with the government for a decade following a corruption scandal.】

item.title: 中国需要增加 2025 年财政赤字，削减存款准备金率
item.description: 据国家媒体报道，中国认为有必要在 2025 年提高财政赤字率，并表示将在适当的时候下调必要准备金率和利率。【原文：China sees need to increase fiscal deficit ratio in 2025 and says required reserve ratio and interest rates will be cut at an appropriate time, according to state media.】

item.title: 中国发出加大财政刺激和降息力度以促进经济增长的信号
item.description: 在确定来年政策重点的一次重要经济会议上，中国表示将采取进一步的刺激措施，包括提高 2025 年的预算赤字率。【原文：China signaled further stimulus measures including raising its budget deficit ratio in 2025 at a key economic meeting that sets policy priorities for the coming year.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价在特朗普的助推下重返历史新高
item.description: 从大选后美股反弹中获益最多的投资者莫过于埃隆-马斯克和他的特斯拉股东们。【原文：Few investors have benefited more from the post-election rally in US stocks than Elon Musk and his fellow Tesla shareholders.】
